mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_cpu(cpu_name, cpu_company, cpu_clock, cpu_core, cpu_thread, cpu_socket, cpu_graphic,cpu_cooler, cpu_regdate, cpu_price, cpu_image) VALUES(#{cpu_name}, #{cpu_company}, #{cpu_clock}, #{cpu_core}, #{cpu_thread}, #{cpu_socket}, #{cpu_graphic}, #{cpu_cooler}, now(), #{cpu_price}, #{cpu_image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM p_cpu WHERE cpu_status=0) p_cpu WHERE cpu_company like CONCAT('%', #{cpu_company}) ORDER BY cpu_clock,cpu_price,cpu_company
